original_text: At the end of the seven years she came back from the land of the Philistines and went to appeal to the king for her house and land.
korean_text: 칠 년이 다하매 여인이 블레셋 사람들의 땅에서 돌아와 자기 집과 전토를 위하여 호소하려 하여 왕에게 나아갔더라

sentences.original_text: At the end of the seven years
she came back from the land of the Philistines
and went to appeal to the king
